title: Chain Shirt
contents: text | Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearerâ€™s upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.

title: Shield
contents: text | Made of metal, a shield is carried in one hand.  You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

title: Spear
contents: description | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
description | Versatile | This weapon can be used with two hands. Use Versatile damage value when used two handed.

title: Light Spear
contents: description | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
description | Versatile | This weapon can be used with two hands. Use Versatile damage value when used two handed.
description | Light | When you duel wield light weapons, you can use a bonus action to attack with your off hand without adding ability mods to the damage.

title: Longsword "Talon"
contents: description | Versatile | This weapon can be used with two hands. Use Versatile damage value when used two handed.
text | You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls

title: Dagger
contents: description | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage rolls.
description | Light | When you duel wield light weapons, you can use a bonus action to attack with your off hand without adding ability mods to the damage.
description | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
